official_title: A bill to require the Commandant of the Coast Guard to submit any organizational realignment plan to Congress for approval prior to implementation.

summary.text: Requires, before the implementation of any Coast Guard organizational realignment plan: (1) the Commandant of the Coast Guard to report to the Senate Commerce, Science, and Transportation Committee and the House Merchant Marine and Fisheries Committee, giving a complete statement on the realignment and the reasons for the realignment; and (2) approval of such plan by an Act of Congress.

titles.title: A bill to require the Commandant of the Coast Guard to submit any organizational realignment plan to Congress for approval prior to implementation.
